GeneDef.label: fire blast
GeneDef.description:
Supers with this power are able to summon a ball of fire that explodes to leave fuel all over the ground.

This doesn't render you immune to fire, so remember to get protection.

This ability was developed to give supers a method to deal with a large number enemies quickly. The original version of this gene was so destructive that it had to be intentionally weakened to avoid destroying everything in an area similar to an antigrain warhead.

GeneDef.label: lightning blast
GeneDef.description: Supers with this power are able to summon a ball of lightning that explodes to cause damage to both flesh and electronics.\n\nThis ability was developed to give supers a method to deal with a large number enemies quickly. The original version of this gene was so destructive that it had to be intentionally weakened because it took far to much energy from the super to activate.

GeneDef.label: toxic blast
GeneDef.description:
Supers with this power are able to summon a ball of poison explodes to create a cloud that inflicts toxic buildup.

This doesn't render you immune to toxins, so remember to get protection.

GeneDef.label: emp blast
GeneDef.description: Supers with this power are able to summon a ball of electricity that will explode and disable various electronics in an area. This ball is not strong enough to cause damage.\n\nThis ability was developed to give supers a method to deal with a large number enemies quickly. The original version of this gene was so explosive that it had to be intentionally weakened because it took far to much energy from the super to activate.

GeneDef.label: foam blast
GeneDef.description: Supers with this power are able to summon a ball of foam that will explode and douse flames and prevent the area from catching on fire.\n\nThis ability was developed to give supers a method to deal with a large number enemies quickly. The original version of this gene was so explosive that it had to be intentionally weakened because it took far to much energy from the super to activate.

GeneDef.label: petrification blast
GeneDef.description:
Supers with this power are able to summon a ball of infused stone that will invade a targets bloodstream like a toxin.

Petrification will not kill a target and gradually wears off. It is primarily for disabling people you want to capture.

Petrification will have less effect on larger pawns/animals, along with any pawn that has innate blunt armor protection. The original version of this gene was so destructive that it had to be intentionally weakened because it would petrify far too many people for far too long.

Pawns with the Super Durability gene are completely immune to this, and pawns with a strong enough innate armor, whether due to genes or implants, are almost impossible to completely petrify, though they will still be slowed.

GeneDef.label: water blast
GeneDef.description: Supers with this power are able to shoot a ball of pressurized water that causes some damage on explosion and puts out fires. This also leaves a weird watery foam on the target that makes them feel uncomfortable, while also creating a firefoam-like layer over their body that prevents them from catching fire again for a time.
